name: fluxcapacitor
description: A bunch of tools to implement apps the Flux way
author: Mathieu ANCELIN

scripts.build: browserify --standalone FluxCapacitor src/fluxcapacitor.js -o dist/fluxcapacitor.js; uglifyjs dist/fluxcapacitor.js --source-map dist/fluxcapacitor.min.map --source-map-url fluxcapacitor.min.map -p 1 -mc -o dist/fluxcapacitor.min.js
